card.name: 10,000 Volt Ghost
card.text: Generates dangerous electric changes. Randomly Bury one defending Ally when Threat is revealed.

card.name: A Clue
card.text: When this card is played, subtract 1 from the Sanity Gain of this card for each Adventure card currently in play around your Investigator, then Bury this card.

card.name: A Tiki Scare Is No Fair
card.text: While vacationing in HAWAII, the gang was enjoying the local luau and dancing at the PINEAPPLE PARLOR. Unfortunately, the party awoke the spirit of Mano Tiki Tia and they were given a GHOSTLY WARNING to leave. The gang headed to the HAUNTED TIKI VILLAGE to learn more about Mano Tiki Tia. They searched the WITCHDOCTOR'S HAUNTED HUT and surrounding area. The WITCHDOCTOR showed up to chase them, but the gang found a HIDING SPOT and were able to SET A TRAP for the MONSTER.

card.name: Alexander Cabot III
card.text: Joins with any Musician Allies.

card.name: Alter To Mano Tiki Tia
card.text: You may not use a Travel by Car or Travel by Train event to reach this location.

card.name: Back Door
card.text: A Townsfolk Riot may not be played while this card is in play. Back Door remains in play for the remainder of Round. Bury at the end of the Round or if you travel to a new Subregion or Dimension.

card.name: Beauregard Mansion
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea card to get to this Location. For each Turn spent at the Beauregard Mansion doing nothing else, you may draw a card from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Black Knight, The
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card at Night.

card.name: Captured
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. When revealed, Skip the remainder of this Round's Combat. Go directly to End Of Round and Bury all Threats.

card.name: Car
card.text: Play this card and immediately play a new Location in the same Region right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Charlie the Robot
card.text: Use a City / Artifact Gate to play as an Ally. When Charlie the Robot is revealed in Combat, you may Bypass Combat with opponent's Threat. Invisible at Night.

card.name: Chase Scene
card.text: Play this card on an existing threat. Bury card at end of round. When card is played, flip a coin. Heads: Threat goes after owner of CHASE SCENE. Tails: Threat goes after a player of CHASE SCENE's choosing, including original owner of threat.

card.name: Cliffside Village
card.text: All Chief Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Coast Guard Officer
card.text: Protection from Police Investigation. You may choose to Bury this card to cause an opponent to Bury a Travel By Sea Event at the moment it is played. May play Coast Guard Officer immediately when you play any Travel By Sea Event.

card.name: Coin of Ankah
card.text: Flip this card to re-direct a directed threat to a random investigator.

card.name: Command of Elias Kingston
card.text: Target Investigator must Flip random Ally. Spend 1 additional Sanity Point to cause Target Investigator to instead Bury random Ally lacking the Corrupt Attribute.

card.name: County Museum Of Archeology
card.text: All Professors, Scholars and Students add 1 point to their card value while this card is your current Location on your Story Deck.

card.name: Creeper, The
card.text: Add one point to the value of this card while your Current Location is a Cemetary.

card.name: Crystalomacy
card.text: While this card is in play, all invisible Living Dead Monsters in a Directed Threat are visible.

card.name: Daphne Blake
card.text: At the moment you would Bury, Discard or Flip an Ally or Allies, you may choose to Discard this card instead. Your opponent must then Bury his or her card(s). Joins Meddling Allies.

card.name: Davy Jones
card.text: While at an Inside Water Location, Bury Davy Jones to cause an opponent to Bury a random monster in their threat. Joins with any Musician Allies

attr.value: Steadfast Musician & Actor, Knows English & French

card.name: Decoy For A Dognapper
card.text: While at the local HANGOUT, the gang (at least 2 MEDDLING ALLIES) learns of several DOG nappings. After following A CLUE, the trail led straight into an ancient CLIFFSIDE VILLAGE in the COUNTRY. In the middle of searching through an old SACRED INDIAN ALTAR, the gang was suddenly surprised by a GHOST SHAMAN. After escaping the spooky goon, they were lucky to DISCOVER A SECRET STASH. What the gang found was a plot by two criminals (2 CORRUPT ALLIES) to kidnap show dogs to rig an international dog show.

card.name: Department of Archeology
card.text: All Professors and Scholars add 1 point to their value when this card is your current Location on your Story Deck.

card.name: Dick Van Dyke
card.text: At the moment you arrive at any Country Gate Location, you may immediately play this card.

card.name: Discover Secret Stash
card.text: Immediately play an Artifact card regardless of current Location's attributes. Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Diving Suit
card.text: You Investigator and all Allies are able to Breathe Underwater while this card is in play.

card.name: Don Knotts
card.text: Flip this card face-down to draw a new card from the top of your Mythos deck.

card.name: Don't Fool With A Phantom
card.text: The gang was at a dance party at a local tv station when all of a sudden, THE WAX PHANTOM appeared. Afterwards it's discovered that the general manager and good FRIEND of the gang has been kidnapped. Following a hunch, VELMA suggests they check out OLD MAN GRISBY, a wax figure maxer who was fired by the station years ago and vowed revenge. When they met him at his HOUSE, he claimed that he created the creature at his WAX WORKS in the basement of the WAX MUSEUM with the help of an ancient SPELL.

card.name: Dr. Najib
card.text: Use Dr. Najib to steal a random artifact (cause it to be discarded) from an opponent, then discard Dr. Najib

card.name: Dynamite
card.text: Add 6 points to Ally's value. One weapon per Ally. If Ally is Buried, also Bury this card. Discard both Dynamite and Ally after use in Combat.

card.name: Dynasty of Ankah, The
card.text: May immediately play Coin of Ankah with no Sanity cost.

card.name: Evil Henchmen
card.text: Bury this card if opposing Police Detective Allies in combat. Joins Evil Henchmen

card.name: Fenokee Fizz
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's value. One Weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, Fenokee Fizz suffers the same fate.

card.name: Four Cryptical Books of Zen Tuo
Fred Jones
card.text: As long as Fred is chosen as a defending Ally, he raises the card value of all other Meddling defending Allies by one point. Not cumulative with another Ally's Command Ability. Joins Meddling Allies

card.name: Funky Fritter Batter
card.text: Add 2 points to Ally's value. One Weapon per Ally. If Ally is Discarded or Buried, Funky Fritter Batter suffers the same fate.

card.name: Gator Ghoul
card.text: Add 1 point to the vaule of this card if the Current Location of you or your opponent features the Water attribute.

card.name: Ghastly Goons
card.text: Joins other Ghastly Goons.

card.name: Ghost of Capt Cutler
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Water Location.

card.name: Ghost of Elias Kingston
card.text: When Directed Threat is revealed, randomly choose one of your opponent's Allies (Defending or not) and Flip cards face-down.

card.name: Ghost of Injun Joe
card.text: Add 1 point to this card's value if your opponent is in an Underground Location. Bury this card if it is currently Day.

card.name: Ghost of Zen Tuo
card.text: Each Ghost of Zen Tuo surviving to affect your opponent's Allies or Investigator also steals one chosen Artifact. Your opponent must Bury the card in his or her Story Deck. Joins Servants of Zen Tuo.

card.name: Ghost Shaman
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your Investigator is in any Ruins Location or if any Night card is play.

card.name: Ghostly Warning
card.text: Even if already Walking, opponent must play a Travel Event or a new Location next Turen or suffer an attack worth 5 points. Allies may defend. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Gold City
card.text: On a following Turn, you may play Gold City Mine or Old Mine Storehouse right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Gypsy Wagon
card.text: Spend 2 Sanity Points to take a 13 second glance at any opponent's hand and choose their next legal move.

card.name: Haunted Tiki Village
card.text: You may not use a Travel by Car or Travel by Train event to reach this location.

card.name: Hawaii
card.text: You may not use a Travel by Train event to reach this location.

card.name: Headless Spectre
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card at Night. Joins other Living Dead.

card.name: Hiding Spot
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. When revealed, cards in an opposing Directed Threat are immediately Buried. No Cosmic Battle occurs. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Hynotist's Coin
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity Point to use. Flip this card to cause Opponent to Flip all Steadfast Allies for the remainder of the Round. Allies with the Dreamer attribute are not affected.

card.name: Incriminating Evidence
card.text: Opponent must Bury a random Tome when this card is played. Opponent may choose to Discard a random Corrupt ally instead. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Indian Picture Rock
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon The Willawaw and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts. You may use this Gate to play Dreamlands Monsters.

card.name: Kelp Monster
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card when attacking an Investigator who is at a Water Location. Add 2 points if target Investigator is currently using a Travel by Sea Event as their Current Location.

card.name: Kerosine Lamp
card.text: While this card is in play, all Monsters in your Threat function as if it is Day. During Combat, Bury this card to Bury one Monster in a Directed Threat facing your Investigator.

card.name: Kingston Mansion
card.text: All Living Dead Allies add 1 point to their card value when this card is your current Location.

card.name: Levitate
card.text: Travel to any location as if Walking. May not travel between Regions, or to Exotic Locations.

card.name: Local Deputy
card.text: Protection from Police Investigation and from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may choose to Bury this card instead. Your opponent then must Bury his or her card.

card.name: Local Sheriff
card.text: Protection from Police Investigation and from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may choose to Bury this card instead. Your opponent then must Bury his or her card.

card.name: Look Behind You!
card.text: A Random Monster in chosen opponent's Threat attacks their own Investigator! Allies may defend. Bury this card & target Monster.

card.name: Madame Zokar
card.text: Can know any one Spell. When Spell is cast you may choose to Flip the Spell face-down and pay its Sanity cost instead of Burying it.

card.name: Magic Carpet
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity Point to use. Flip this card to play a new Location card in the same Dimension, right-side-up, regardless of any Travel requirements. Does not override any further requirements. Permits Travel between Regions, Islands, and Exotic Locations, but not to Underwater Locations.

card.name: Malt Shop
card.text: You may immediately play one Professor, Student or Poet Ally when this card becomes your Current Location. Remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Malt Shop
card.text: Upon playing this card, you may immediately play one Ally who speaks a language that your Investigator does not speak, who would normally be playable in this Region. Remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Malt Shop
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Malt Shop
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Malt Shop
card.text: You may immediately Bury Hydrophobia affecting your Investigator when this card becomes your Current Locaiton. Remain here for one Turn and Bury any one other Phobia.

card.name: Malt Shop Shock Hop
card.text: It's Saturday NIGHT and you're at the local HANGOUT with the rest of the gang (at least 2 MEDDLING ALLIES). Someone starts telling a spooky story, when the lights go out. ZOINKS! It's a MONSTER! As it approaches a CHASE SCENE ensues. Luckily you SET A TRAP and save the DAY! With a job well done, it's time for a triple decker pastrami on rye with peanut butter, bananas and mustard to hit the spot...

card.name: Map
card.text: Flip this card to immediately play a new Locations from the same Region right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Mask of Zen Tuo
card.text: Add 1 point (cumulative) to the value of each Monster in the same threat as Servants of Zen Tuo or Ghost of Zen Tuo.

card.name: Medicine
card.text: Discard this card to avoid the effects of an Epidemic.

card.name: Monster from the Future
card.text: Increase the value of this Monster by 2 points if Summoned. Joins any Monster from the Future.

card.name: Moody Manor
card.text: All Seaman Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Morbid Repose
card.text: Randomly choose and Flip face down half (round up) of Target Opponent's Allies as if suffering the effects of an Epidemic.

card.name: Motor Scooter
card.text: Play this card and immediately play a new Location in the same Region right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Mr. Chi
card.text: Play in either Waking World or New Aeon. You may remain with Mr. Chi for one turn at any Site and Bury one Phobia.

card.name: Mr. Creeps
card.text: Protection from Frivolous Lawsuit.

card.name: Mr. Farmer Opens Fire
card.text: Bury opponent's Ally of up to 2 points (excluding the value of any Weapons). Then, Bury this card.

card.name: Mr. Hyde
card.text: To play this card you must also Bury Dr. Jekyll; you may not play Dr. Jekyll while you have Mr. Hyde in play. Flip this card face-down to cause an opponent to flip a random Artifact.

card.name: Mummy
card.text: Add 1 points to the value of this card if either you or your Opponent is in a Cemetary or Museum Location.

card.name: Mystery Machine
card.text: Flip this card to immediately play a new Location either in the same Region or in a new Region, right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Mystery Machine
card.text: Play this card and immediately play a new Location either in the same Region or in a new Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Mystery Mask Mixup
card.text: While hanging out in Chinatown, DAPHNE stopped into a local BUSINESS and purchased an old ARTIFACT. On the trip home, the gang was stopped by a couple of MONSTERS (2 different cards) who demanded an old mask the gang bought. After ditching the two goons, they stopped by a local art dealer who claimed the item was THE MASK OF ZEN TUO and the GHOST OF ZEN TUO would stop at nothing to get it back. But after some investigating, the gang discovered that the goons chasing them were art theives who had the fake mask sent to the curio shop by mistake.

card.name: Necronomicon Doo Edition
card.text: Spend 1 Sanity point to turn one Steadfast Ally to a Corrupt Ally. Spend 2 Sanity points to play an Ally card face-down as a Monster becoming part of your Threat.

card.name: Norville "Shaggy" Rogers
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card while you have Scooby-Doo in play. Joins Meddling Allies

card.name: Oh No, My Glasses!
card.text: Flip target Ally. If it is Night, Target Investigator must remain in his or her current Location for the next Turn but may play cards other than a new Location card or Travel Event.

card.name: Old Gypsy Woman
card.text: Flip Old Gypsy Woman once per Round to gain a 13 second glance at any opponent's Threat.

card.name: Old Man Grisby
card.text: Bury Old Man Grisby to cause an opponent to Discard one random Meddling Ally.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist & Artist, Knows English & German

card.name: Old Masoleum
card.text: Rather than playing a Monster card from your hand, you may instead use this Gate to summon a Living Dead Monster or Ally from your Story Deck to your Threat.

card.name: Peeping Portrait
card.text: Play this card to take a 13 second glance at a number of cards on top of an Opponent's Mythos Deck equal to their Investigator's current Minimum. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Phyllis Diller
card.text: You may Bury Phyllis Diller instead of paying the Sanity cost for playing one Artifact.

card.name: Pineapple Parlor, The
card.text: You may remain here for one Turn and Bury one Phobia. You may not use a Travel by Train event to reach this location.

card.name: Prof. Hyde-White
card.text: You may Bury Prof. HydeWhite instead of paying the Sanity cost for playing one Tome.

card.name: Prof. Wickles
card.text: Flip Prof. Wickles to cause an opponent to Flip a random Weapon.

card.name: Professor of Archeology
card.text: Bury this card if Dr. Najib is brought into play alongside any Investigator. Also, the Professor of Archeology is not turned Corrupt by cards that turn Allies Corrupt.

attr.value: Steadfast Professor, Knows English and Glyphs

card.name: Public Library
card.text: You may use the Gate to play a Tome card regardless of language of Investigator or Allies while the Public Library is your Current Location.

card.name: Radar
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity to use. Flip this card face-down to flip all cards in one opponent's Threat face-up.

card.name: Ransacked
card.text: Opponent may not use Artifact or Tome attribute of Current Location. Bury this card when opponents plays a Travel Event or arrives at a new Location.

card.name: Red Heron
card.text: While this card is in play, add one to the Maximum number of cards that you may keep in your Hand. Cummulative with other Allies that raise your Maximum.

card.name: Sacred Indian Altar
card.text: For each additional Turn you remain here, you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Sacred Indian Temple
card.text: Gain 4 Sanity points, but reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. Apply any Sanity gain or loss indicated in the pentagram on the card, then Discard it. During each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Sandy Duncan
card.text: While at an Outside Location, you may Discard Sandy to gain 2 additional Sanity Points. Additionally, all Players must reveal the top card of their Mythos Deck. If card revealed is an Artist or Musician Ally, it immediately comes into play around Owners Investigator regardless of any requirements. Otherwise, Discard it.

card.name: Scooby Dee
card.text: Draw one additional card at the beginning of each Round while Scooby Dee is in play. Not cumulative with other cards that allow you to increase Hand size.

card.name: Scooby Doo And A Mummy Too
card.text: SCOOBY and the gang (at least 2 other MEDDLING ALLIES) were visiting their SCHOLAR friend at the DEPARTMENT OF ARCHEOLOGY. The MUSEUM was displaying a new MUMMY and the rare COIN OF ANKAH. While at the local MALT SHOP, the gang heard about a break in and sighting of a MONSTER over at the UNIVERSITY and rushed over to investigate. After finding a TOME and SPELL, the gang pieced together that the MUMMY was really DR. NAJIB dressed up, and that he wanted the priceless ARTIFACT to himself.

card.name: Scooby Dum
card.text: Bury Scooby Dum to add the value of this card including any bonuses to your Investigator's Sanity.

card.name: Scooby Snacks
card.text: Place this Artifact with an Ally. Only 1 Scooby Snacks per Ally. Bury this card to give target Ally a temporary bonus of +2. Bury target Ally only if they take their full card value in Sanity loss, including any bonuses. Otherwise, return Ally to Investigator's side. If Ally holding Scooby Snacks is lost, this card suffers the same fate.

card.name: Scooby-Doo
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card while you have Norville “Shaggy” Rogers in play. Additionally, add 1 point to the value of this card if Scooby Snacks accompanies Scooby-Doo. Can not be given weapons. Joins Meddling Allies.

card.name: Sea Myths & Monsters
card.text: While this tome is in play, increase the total value of your Threat by 1 point if your opponent is at a Location with the Water attribute.

card.name: Servants of Zen Tuo
card.text: Joins both Ghost of Zen Tuo and Servants of Zen Tuo.

card.name: Set A Trap
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. When card is revealed, targeted opponent reveals top card of their Mythos Deck. If it is a Monster, it attacks them immediately. Allies may defend, then Discard it. Discard any other card drawn.

card.name: Skull Island
card.text: This island has no airstrips. You must use a Travel by Sea Event to reach it. You may use this Gate more than once, but you must pay this card's Sanity cost for each subsequent use.

card.name: Someone at the Window
card.text: Take a 13 second glance at one opponent's hand, then Bury this card.

card.name: Spooky Space Kook
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if your opponent is in a Country/Gate Location. Joins other Spooky Space Kooks

card.name: Staff of Mano Tiki Tia
card.text: Add 1 point to Ally's value. If ally is Discarded or Buried, this weapon suffers the same fate. During the Artifacts Use phase of Combat, Discard this card to Discard an Opponent's Artifact or Tome.

card.name: Staring Statue
card.text: Double the stated Sanity Loss of a specific Phobia Event affecting target Opponent.

card.name: Sunken U-Boat
card.text: Beginning each Turn, you must be able to Breathe Underwater, or lose 5 Sanity points.

card.name: Talking Skull, The
card.text: Can know any one Spell. Bury spell in your Story Deck after it is cast. Knows Arabic, Greek and Latin.

card.name: Teratophobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point for each Directed Threat surviving the Cosmic Battle to affect your Investigator.

card.name: The 13 Ghosts of Scooby Doo
card.text: You and a STEADFAST ACTOR or ACTRESS accidentally set free a bakers dozen of undead nasties. Now you have to hunt them down (13 points-worth of LIVING DEAD MONSTERS in your story deck). Traveling to a SITE, some RUINs, a CEMETARY and even an UNDERGROUND LOCATION (4 DIFFERENT CARDS), you eventually get them all CAPTURED and stored inside of a special ARTIFACT. Whew, maybe next time you won't knock over that deceased wizard's urn...

card.name: The Gruesome Game Of The Gator Ghoul
card.text: While visiting with MA & PA KETTLE at the SKILLET SHOWBOAT, the gang (at least 3 MEDDLING ALLIES) learned that most of the staff were scared away by THE GATOR GHOUL, a hideous demon infesting the nearby Hokeyfenoke Swamp. The gang stumbled upon some INCRIMINATING EVIDENCE while looking through SAM STINGEY'S CABIN, the janitor at the showboat. Looks like the monster was none other than a disgruntled employee (CORRUPT ALLY) who had plans on stealing the recipe for the Kettle's famous FENOKE FIZZ soda.

card.name: Time Machine
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity point to use. Flip this card and walk to any Location (except Exotic) in another Dimension. If your new Location is in the same subregion as your Current Location, you may instead play it right-side-up.

card.name: Uncle Dave's Cabin
card.text: Randomly Discard one card from your Hand. During each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Uncle Nathaniel Rogers
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card while Norville “Shaggy” Rogers or Scooby-Doo is in play.

card.name: Uncle Nathaniel's Place
card.text: Reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. If card revealed is a Monster, it attacks you immediately (Allies may defend), then Discard it. Discard any other card drawn. For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting you Investigator.

card.name: Unexpected Surprise!
card.text: Immediately play this card to bring an Ally Buried in your Story Deck back into play. Re-apply any Sanity indicated.

card.name: Unmasking The Villian
card.text: Immediately take a 13 second glance at all cards in one opponent's threat and bury one monster in opponent's story deck.

card.name: Velma Dinkley
card.text: Velma may serve as any one card required to complete an Adventure. Discard her when this special ability is used. Joins Meddling Allies

card.name: Voodoo Dolls
card.text: Costs 1 Sanity to use. Choose one of the following: Flip this card to Flip a target Ally. Bury this card to Bury a target Ally. Discard this card to Discard a target Ally.

card.name: Watch Out! The Willowaw!
card.text: Relaxing at UNCLE DAVE'S CABIN was fun, until the gang (at least 2 MEDDLING ALLIES) were surprised by a large creature flying through the night skies. A local indian, RED HERON told of the legend of THE WILLOWAW, who would snatch you up if an owl ever hooted your name. Returning home, the gang found the cabin RANSACKED and Velma's uncle missing. Heading out to INDIAN PICTURE ROCK at NIGHT, the gang stumbled upon a cache of stolen goods in PICTURE ROCK CAVE. Seems that some theives used the legend to scare people away.

card.name: Wax Museum
card.text: Your Artist Allies add 1 point to their card value when this is your Current Location.

card.name: Wax Works
card.text: When this card becomes your Current Location you may immediately us its gate to play Monster(s).

card.name: What A Night For A Knight
card.text: While driving along in the MYSTERY MACHINE, the gang (at least 3 MEDDLING ALLIES) came upon a truck on the side of the road. It carried a large box with the address to a local MUSEUM and was made out to a PROFESSOR HYDE-WHITE. The gang learned that the professor was missing as was the contents of the box, THE BLACK KNIGHT. During the NIGHT, the gang slipped in through the BACK DOOR, and searched the museum. Upon finding the MUSEUM SECRET ROOM, they knew that the culprit was PROFESSOR WICKLES.

card.name: Which Witch Is Which?
card.text: Taking a back road through an old bayou, the gang almost run over a ZOMBIE that was on the road. When at a local BUSINESS to get directions back to the highway, they learn the monster is under the control of a witch. After a trip to ZEB PERKINS PLACE, it is discovered that he and another man are missing. Continuing on to the OLD WITCH'S SHACK, VOODOO DOLLS are found! The trail leads down to a DERELICT RIVERBOAT where the truth is revealed! The two spooks are really Zeb & Zeke, who were searching for a lost treasure.

card.name: Willawaw, The
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if your opponents is at an Outside Location.

card.name: Witchdoctor, The
card.text: For each Witchdoctor surviving the Cosmic Battle, Bury a random Artifact of Target Investigator.

card.name: Witchdoctor's Haunted Hut
card.text: You may not use a Travel by Car or Travel by Train event to reach this location.

card.name: Zoinks!
card.text: Target Investigator loses 1 Sanity point and must play a new Location in the same Region on their next Turn, even if already Walking. If unable to play a new Location, Target Investigator's Turn is skipped. Bury this card after Opponent's Turn is over.

card.name: Zombie
card.text: If any Allies are lost in Combat involving a Zomibe, begin next Round with one Zombie card face-down in your Threat (forms a new Threat). Joins Living Dead.
